translation: That highest Purusha, O Arjuna, is attainable by unswerving devotion to Him alone, within Whom all beings dwell and by Whom all this is pervaded.
commentary: 8.22 Purusha Purusha? He's that? The next highest? Partha O Partha? Bhaktya by devotion? is attainable? You verily? exclusively without another object (unswerving)? whose of whom? dwelling within? Bhootani beings? Yen by whom? Everything all? This is this? Tatam pervaded.Commentary All the beings (effects) dwell within the Purusha (the Supreme Person? the cause) because every effect rests within its cause.
